action->Cantrip Connection.description:
La etiqueta se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.rs4Awf4k1e0Mj797]

Puedes preparar un truco adicional, o si tienes un repertorio, en su lugar designa un truco para agregar a tu repertorio cada vez que selecciones esta habilidad; puedes volver a entrenarlo pero no puedes cambiarlo de otra manera. Debes poder preparar trucos o agregarlos a tu repertorio para seleccionar esto.

ancestry->Cat.name: Gato
ancestry->Cat.description:
Tu compañero es un felino grande, como un leopardo o un tigre.

Talla Pequeña

Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 mandíbulas (delicadeza), Daño 1d6 perforación

Cuerpo a cuerpo 1 garra (ágil, delicadeza), Daño 1d4 cortante

Fuerza +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

Puntos de vida 4

Habilidad Sigilo

Sentidos visión con poca luz, olfato (impreciso, 30 pies)

Velocidad 35 pies

Especial Tu gato inflige 1d4 de daño de precisión adicional contra objetivos desprevenidos.

Beneficio de apoyo Tu gato desequilibra a tus enemigos cuando creas una apertura. Hasta el comienzo de tu siguiente turno, tus Golpes que causan daño a una criatura que tu gato amenaza hacen que el objetivo sea @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} hasta el final de tu próximo turno.

Maniobra avanzada @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-animal-companions.AC-Advanced-Maneuvers.Item.U0J8J5ukmqnOskE8]{Cat Pounce}

action->Cat Support Benefit.name: Beneficio de soporte para gatos
action->Cat Support Benefit.description: Tu gato desequilibra a tus enemigos cuando creas una abertura. Hasta el comienzo de tu siguiente turno, tus Golpes que causan daño a una criatura dentro del alcance de tu gato hacen que el objetivo sea @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} hasta el final de tu siguiente turno.

ancestry->Cat.name: Cat
ancestry->Cat.description:
Your companion is a big cat, such as a leopard or tiger.

Size Small

Melee 1 jaws (finesse), Damage 1d6 piercing

Melee 1 claw (agile, finesse), Damage 1d4 slashing

Str +2, Dex +3, Con +1, Int -4, Wis +2, Cha +0

Hit Points 4

Skill Stealth

Senses low-light vision, scent (imprecise, 30 feet)

Speed 35 feet

Special Your cat deals 1d4 extra precision damage against off-guard targets.

Support Benefit Your cat throws your enemies off-balance when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that deal damage to a creature that your cat threatens make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your next turn.

Advanced Maneuver Cat Pounce

action->Cat Support Benefit.name: Cat Support Benefit
action->Cat Support Benefit.description: Your cat throws your enemies off-balance when you create an opening. Until the start of your next turn, your Strikes that deal damage to a creature within your cat's reach make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the end of your next turn.

action->Cat Support Benefit.description: Tu gato desequilibra a tus enemigos cuando creas una abertura. Hasta el comienzo de tu siguiente turno, tus Golpes que causan daño a una criatura dentro del alcance de tu gato hacen que el objetivo sea @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} hasta el final de tu próximo turno.

feat->Mature Animal Companion.name: Compañero animal maduro
feat->Mature Animal Companion.description: Para hacer avanzar a un compañero animal joven a un compañero animal maduro (normalmente como resultado de una de tus elecciones de hazañas de clase), aumenta sus modificadores de Fuerza, Destreza, Constitución y Sabiduría en 1. Aumenta su daño de ataque sin armas de un dado a dos dados. (por ejemplo, 1d8 a 2d8), y su rango de competencia para Percepción y todas las tiradas de salvación a experto. Aumentar sus rangos de competencia en Intimidación, Sigilo y Supervivencia a entrenado, y si ya estaba entrenado en una de esas habilidades.de su tipo, aumenta su rango de competencia en esa habilidad a experto. Si tu acompañante es Mediano o más pequeño, crece una talla.

consumable->Scroll of Grim Tendrils (Ran.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.RjuupS9xyXDLgyIr]
Pergamino de zarcillos sombríos (rango 1)
consumable->Scroll of Grim Tendrils (Ran.consumableSpellDescription:
Tendrils of darkness curl out from your fingertips and race through the air. You deal 2d4 void damage and @Damage[(@item.level)[bleed]] damage to living creatures in the line. Each living creature in the line must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half the void damage and no persistent bleed damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double void damage and double persistent bleed damage.

Heightened (+1) The void damage increases by 2d4, and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.

Scroll of Invisibility (Rank 2)
consumable->Scroll of Invisibility (Rank.consumableSpellDescription:
Illusions bend light around the target, rendering it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.
consumable->Scroll of Invisibility (Rank.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Y7UD64foDbDMV9sx]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.XXqE1eY3w3z6xJCB]{Invisibility}

Casting a Spell from a scroll requires holding the scroll in one hand and activating it with a Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for that spell.

The spell must appear on your spell list. Because you're the one Casting the Spell, use your spell attack modifier and spell DC. The spell also gains the appropriate trait for your tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).

Any physical costs are provided when a scroll is created, so you don't need to provide them when casting from a scroll. If the spell requires a locus, you must have that locus to Cast the Spell from a scroll.

Note: To create a scroll or wand of a specific spell, drag the spell from the compendium or compendium browser into the inventory of a PC, NPC, or loot actor.

Varita de armadura mística (rango 1)
consumable->Wand of Mystic Armor (Rank 1.consumableSpellDescription:
You ward yourself with shimmering magical energy, gaining a +1 item bonus to AC and a maximum Dexterity modifier of +5. While wearing mystic armor , you use your unarmored proficiency to calculate your AC.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.qkwb5DD3zmKwvbk0] {Spell Effect: Mystic Armor}

Heightened (4th) You gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

Heightened (6th) The item bonus to AC increases to +2, and you gain a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

Heightened (8th) The item bonus to AC increases to +2, and you gain a +2 item bonus to saving throws.

Heightened (10th) The item bonus to AC increases to +3, and you gain a +3 item bonus to saving throws.

consumable->Scroll of Pet Cache (Rank 1).name:
<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.RjuupS9xyXDLgyIr]
Scroll of Pet Cache (Rank 1)
consumable->Scroll of Pet Cache (Rank 1).consumableSpellDescription:
You open your cloak or create a gap with your hands, drawing the target into a pocket dimension just large enough for its basic comfort. No other creature can enter this extradimensional space, and the target can bring along objects only if they were designed to be worn by a creature of its kind. The space has enough air, food, and water to sustain the target for the duration.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell. The spell also ends if you die or enter an extradimensional space. When the spell ends, the target reappears in the nearest unoccupied space (outside of any extradimensional space you may have entered).
consumable->Scroll of Pet Cache (Rank 1).consumableSpellTarget: 1 willing creature that is your companion

Wand of Soothe (Rank 1)
consumable->Wand of Soothe (Rank 1).consumableSpellDescription:
You grace the target's mind, boosting its mental defenses and healing its wounds. The target regains 1d10+4 Hit Points when you Cast the Spell and gains a +2 status bonus to saves against mental effects for the duration.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.nkk4O5fyzrC0057i]{Spell Effect: Soothe}

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing increases by 1d10+4.

0.text: Puedes infligir daño por salpicadura solo a tu objetivo principal en lugar del área de salpicadura habitual.

0.label: Control de la respiración (frente a inhalación)

1.text: Si obtienes un éxito en una tirada de salvación contra una amenaza inhalada, obtendrás un éxito crítico.

0.text: Puedes infligir daño por salpicadura solo a tu objetivo principal en lugar del área de salpicadura habitual.

0.label: Control de la respiración (frente a inhalación)

1.text: Si obtienes un éxito en una tirada de salvación contra una amenaza inhalada, obtendrás un éxito crítico.

0.text: Puedes infligir daño por salpicadura solo a tu objetivo principal en lugar del área de salpicadura habitual.
Tus tiradas de salvación exitosas contra un veneno reducen su nivel en 2 (o 1 para un veneno virulento). Cada éxito crítico reduce su nivel en 3 (o 2 en el caso de un veneno virulento).
Al usar Supervivencia para subsistir, si obtienes un resultado peor que un éxito, obtendrás un éxito. También puedes proporcionar medios de vida de subsistencia para múltiples criaturas.
Your succesful saving throws against a poison reduce its stage by 2 (or 1 for a virulent poison). Each critical success reduces its stage by 3 (or 2 for a virulent poison).
While using Survival to Subsist, if you roll any result worse than a success, you get a success. You can also provide subsistence living for multiple creatures.

consumable->Scroll of Runic Weapon (Rank.consumableSpellDescription:
The weapon glimmers with magic as temporary runes carve down its length. The target becomes a +1 striking weapon , gaining a +1 item bonus to attack rolls and increasing the number of weapon damage dice to two.

Heightened (6th) The weapon is +2 greater striking .

Heightened (9th) The weapon is +3 major striking .

consumable->Scroll of Faerie Fire (Rank.name:

Pergamino de fuego de hadas (rango 2)
consumable->Scroll of Faerie Fire (Rank.consumableSpellDescription: Todas las criaturas en el área cuando lanzas el hechizo quedan cubiertas por un fuego colorido y sin calor de un color de tu elección mientras dure. Las criaturas visibles no pueden ser @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W] {Concealed} mientras estén afectadas por el fuego de las hadas. Si las criaturas son @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.zJxUflt9np0q4yML] {Invisible} , están Ocultas mientras estén afectadas por el fuego de las hadas, en lugar de ser @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf] {Undetected} .

consumable->Scroll of Restoration (Rank.name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Y7UD64foDbDMV9sx]
Pergamino de Restauración (Rango 2)
consumable->Scroll of Restoration (Rank.consumableSpellDescription:
Restorative magic counters the effects of toxins or conditions that prevent a creature from functioning at its best. When you cast restoration, choose to either reduce a condition or lessen the effect of a toxin. A creature can benefit from only one restoration spell each day, and it can't benefit from restoration more than once to reduce the stage of the same exposure to a given toxin.

  • Lessen a Toxin Reduce the stage of one toxin the target suffers from by one stage. This can't reduce the stage below stage 1 or cure the affliction.
  • Reduce a Condition Reduce the value of the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm] {Torpe} , @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7] {Enfeebled} , or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg] {Anonadado} condition by 2. You can instead reduce two of the listed conditions by 1 each.

Heightened (4th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR] {Drained} to the list of conditions you can reduce. When you lessen a toxin, reduce the stage by two. You also gain a third option that allows you to reduce the target's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv] {Doomed} value by 1. You can't use this to reduce a permanent Doomed condition.

Heightened (6th) As the 4th-rank restoration, but you can reduce a permanent Doomed condition if you add a spellcasting action and a material component while Casting the Spell, during which you provide 100 gp worth of diamond dust as a cost.

consumable->Wand of Heal (Rank 1).name:
La etiqueta <Compendium> se reemplazará con el texto de la entrada del compendio @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.UJWiN0K3jqVjxvKk]
Varita de curación (rango 1)
consumable->Wand of Heal (Rank 1).consumableSpellDescription:
You channel vital energy to heal the living or damage the undead. If the target is a willing living creature, you restore 1d8 Hit Points. If the target is undead, you deal that amount of vitality damage to it, and it gets a basic Fortitude save. The number of actions you spend when Casting this Spell determines its targets, range, area, and other parameters.

1 The spell has a range of touch.

2 (concentrate) The spell has a range of 30 feet. If you're healing a living creature, increase the Hit Points restored by 8.

3 (concentrate) You disperse vital energy in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] . This targets all living and undead creatures in the burst.

Heightened (+1) The amount of healing or damage increases by 1d8, and the extra healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.

0.text: Cuando obtienes un fallo crítico en una prueba de Religión para descifrar escritos de naturaleza religiosa o para recuperar conocimientos sobre los principios de las religiones, obtienes un fallo.

1.text: Cuando intentas recuperar el conocimiento sobre los principios de tu propia fe, si obtienes un fracaso, obtienes un éxito, y si obtienes un éxito, obtienes un éxito crítico.

<Compendium> tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Y7UD64foDbDMV9sx]
Scroll of Cleanse Affliction (Rank 2)
consumable->Scroll of Cleanse Affliction.consumableSpellDescription:
Gentle restorative magic pushes back the effects of toxins and more complex maladies. Choose an affliction on the target, such as a curse, disease, or poison. If it has advanced past stage one, reduce the stage by one. This reduction can be applied only once to a given case of an affliction, with the case ending when it's completely cured. Although the reduction can't occur again, heightened versions of this spell attempt to counteract with each casting.

Heightened (3rd) Attempt to counteract the affliction if it is a disease or poison.

Heightened (4th) Attempt to counteract the affliction if it is a curse, disease, or poison.
consumable->Scroll of Cleanse Affliction.description:
tag will get replaced with text from compendium entry @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Y7UD64foDbDMV9sx]

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.SUKaxVZW2TlM8lu0]{Cleanse Affliction}

Casting a Spell from a scroll requires holding the scroll in one hand and activating it with a Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for that spell.

The spell must appear on your spell list. Because you're the one Casting the Spell, use your spell attack modifier and spell DC. The spell also gains the appropriate trait for your tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).

Any physical costs are provided when a scroll is created, so you don't need to provide them when casting from a scroll. If the spell requires a locus, you must have that locus to Cast the Spell from a scroll.

Note: To create a scroll or wand of a specific spell, drag the spell from the compendium or compendium browser into the inventory of a PC, NPC, or loot actor.

Scroll of Clear Mind (Rank 2)
consumable->Scroll of Clear Mind (Rank 2.consumableSpellDescription:
You drive mental contamination from the target's mind. Attempt to counteract an effect of your choice imposing one of these conditions on the target: @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied}. If you failed to counteract the effect but you would have if its counteract rank were 2 lower, instead suppress the effect until the beginning of your next turn. The effect's duration doesn't elapse while it's suppressed. This spell can't counteract or suppress conditions that are part of curses, diseases, or a natural state of the target.

Heightened (4th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed} to the list of conditions.

Heightened (6th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed} to the list of conditions.

Heightened (8th) Add @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} to the list of conditions.

feat->Counterspell (Sorcerer).name: Contrahechizo (Hechicero)
feat->Counterspell (Sorcerer).description:
Desencadenante Una criatura lanza un hechizo que tienes en tu repertorio.

Requisitos Tienes un espacio de hechizo no gastado que puedes usar para lanzar el hechizo desencadenante.

Cuando un enemigo lanza un hechizo que conoces y puedes ver sus manifestaciones, puedes usar tu propia magia para contrarrestarlo. Gastas uno de tus espacios de hechizo para contrarrestar el lanzamiento por parte de la criatura activadora de un hechizo quetener en su repertorio. Pierdes tu espacio de hechizo como si hubieras lanzado el hechizo desencadenante. Luego intentas contrarrestar el hechizo desencadenante.

Especial Esta dote tiene el rasgo correspondiente a la tradición de los hechizos que lanzas (arcanos, divinos, naturales u ocultos).
